pages.text: Throughout the centuries, magical botanists could not help but discover a multitude of additional magical behaviors and substances in the world. One of these, they found, is the $(item)Celestial Crystal$().

The latent $(thing)magical energy$() that is released when one of these crystals $(thing)grows$() is especially of importance. Using the $(item)Crystalline Extractor$(), this energy can be captured and turned into impressive amounts of $(aura). All one has to do is place it close enough to a crystal that has the ability to grow and wait for it to do so.
